meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rebecca Golden Mike Duval Scott Ylinen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7063.

td.p: Rebecca Golden, a writer from Hamtramck, Michigan
Mike Duval, a television production coordinator from Norwood, Massachusetts
Scott Ylinen, a draftsman and college student from Morgantown, West Virginia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $43,655)

tr.td: WORLD OF WATERCRAFT
CENTRAL AMERICA
WHAT ABOUT BOB?
COMPLETE THE NATIONAL BOOK AWARD TITLE
LIGHT THE CANDLES
ADD AN "S"
(Alex: Each correct response will be two words exactly the same except we have added an "S" to one of them.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1932 Oskar Speck paddled from Germany to Australia in one of these whose name is Inuit for "small boat of skins"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1932 Oskar Speck paddled from Germany to Australia in one of these whose name is Inuit for "small boat of skins"
